key_risk_themes: ["High Complexity of Core Differentiating Features (Custom Modes, Offline Sync)","Timeline Sensitivity to Foundational Tasks and Cross-Cutting Concerns (IaC, Accessibility)","Security and Operational Risks Tied to Architecture Choices (Sandbox, Blue/Green)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Incorporate mandatory accessibility checks (automated and manual) into the Definition of Done for all UI stories, starting from Sprint 1.","Schedule technical design spikes for the 'User-Extensible Custom Modes' sandbox and the 'Offline Synchronization' logic to validate approaches and refine estimates.","Prioritize the creation and thorough testing of the Blue/Green deployment and rollback scripts in the staging environment well before the first production release."]
